meanings.definition: A person who hunts whales for their oil and other products.
meanings.sent1: The brave whalemen set out to sea to hunt for valuable whale oil.
meanings.sent2: The whalemen worked together to catch whales and extract their oil.
meanings.sent3: The whalemen joked that they were 'ocean oil miners' as they sailed the seas.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, the whalemen were like modern-day treasure hunters seeking black gold.
meanings.sent5: The image of the whalemen battling the mighty whales stayed etched in their minds.

meanings.definition: The crew of a whaling ship.
meanings.sent1: The skilled whalemen navigated the whaling ship through rough waters.
meanings.sent2: The whalemen on board worked tirelessly to ensure a successful whale hunt.
meanings.sent3: The whalemen on the ship shared stories and laughter during their long voyages.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the whalemen prepared for another night of hunting in the dark sea.
meanings.sent5: The camaraderie among the whalemen made the dangerous journey more bearable.
